title: Right Tool For The Job
blocka: A Interrupt: +2 Fortune.
blockb: B Interrupt: Solo Survival 2. Success: Effect. Add +2 dice to Survival for the remainder of the season. End of season: Burn card and unlock Keel 2.

title: Alone in the Dark
blocka: (Infiltration Mission) A Interrupt: Solo Thievery 1. Success: Effect. Add +2 dice to all Thievery tests for the remainder of the season. End of season: Burn card and unlock Keel 3.

title: Unlikely Friends
blocka: (Menas in Group) A Interrupt: Remove one psyche condition on Keel. Burn card and unlock Keel 4.

title: The Direct Approach
blocka: A Interrupt: +4 Fortune and every other character in group is Angry. Burn card and unlock Menas 2.

title: Whispering Spirits
blocka: (Oniri in Group) A Interrupt: Menas is Shaken. Burn card and unlock Menas 3.

title: Less Talk!
blocka: (Thea in Group) A Interrupt: Menas is Angry. Burn card and unlock Menas 4.

title: Black and White
blocka: A Interrupt: Solo Rapport: 1. Success: Remove Frustrated or Angry condition on another character.
blockb: B Interrupt: Solo Rapport 2. Success: Remove any psyche condition on another character. Burn card and unlock Thea 2.

title: The Conciliator
blocka: A Interrupt: Solo Command: 2. Success: Thea is Weary and may remove one psyche condition on another character. Burn card and unlock Thea 3.
blockb: B Interrupt: Solo Command 4. Success: +1 Diplomacy.

title: Diplomatic Insights
blocka: (Alliance Mission) A Interrupt: Solo Rapport 3. Success: Examine top 4 cards in progress deck. Arrange as desired. Burn card and unlock Thea 4.
blockb: B Interrupt: Solo Rapport: 2. Success: +2 Fortune.

title: A Call to Action
blocka: Action: Increase the disposition of a faction by one.

title: Market Manipulations
blocka: (Thea in Group) A Interrupt: Thea is Shaken. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 2.

title: Bending Rules
blocka: (Infiltration Mission) A Interrupt: Solo Rapport 2. Success: May return a timer card back into the progress deck. Shuffle progress deck. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 3.

title: Very Charming
blocka: A Interrupt: Solo Rapport 3. Success: All Rapport tests for Fuscus are easy for the remainder of the season. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 4.

title: I'm Always in Pain
blocka: A Interrupt: Give Oniri a condition to remove a condition from someone else in the group. Burn card and unlock Oniri 2.

title: Always Alone
blocka: (Oniri is alone at location with at least one obstacle) A Interrupt: Oniri is Exhausted. Burn card and unlock Oniri 3.

title: Weird Energies
blocka: A Interrupt: Oniri is Shattered. Gain +4 Mana. Burn card and unlock Oniri 4.

title: Food and Water
blocka: A Interrupt: Solo Lore: 3. +2 Fortune. Burn card and unlock Yasmina 2.
blockb: B Interrupt: Solo Lore: 1. On success remove a weary condition on any character in group.

title: TBD
blocka: A

title: TBD
blocka: Take two conditions. Burn card and unlock Viator 3.
